mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.id_1 AS "id1", a.hotelid AS "hotelid", a.name AS "name", a.roomtypepms AS "roomtypepms", a.roomnum AS "roomnum", a.cost AS "cost", a.type AS "type", a.updatetime AS "updatetime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomtype( id, id_1, hotelid, name, roomtypepms, roomnum, cost, type, updatetime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{id1}, #{hotelid}, #{name}, #{roomtypepms}, #{roomnum}, #{cost}, #{type}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE roomtype SET id_1 = #{id1}, hotelid = #{hotelid}, name = #{name}, roomtypepms = #{roomtypepms}, roomnum = #{roomnum}, cost = #{cost}, type = #{type}, updatetime = #{updatetime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.day AS "day", a.price AS "dayPrice" FROM daily_rate a WHERE a.hotelid = #{hotelid} and a.roomtypeid = #{id} and day>(CURRENT_DATE()+0)
SELECT a.price AS "rackRatePrice" FROM rack_rate a WHERE a.hotelid = #{hotelid} and a.roomtypeid = #{id}
SELECT a.week AS "week", a.price AS "weekPrice" FROM weekend_rate a WHERE a.hotelid = #{hotelid} and a.roomtypeid = #{id}
